00019 #ifndef _IPL98_PARAMETER2D_H
00020 #define _IPL98_PARAMETER2D_H
00021 
00022 
00023 #include "../../../../points/point2d.h"
00024 #include <iostream>
00025 
00026 using std::cout;
00027 using std::endl;
00028 
00038 template<class T>class CParameter2D : public CPoint2D<T>
00039 {
00040 public:
00042         inline CParameter2D();
00043 
00047    inline CParameter2D(const T x, const T y);
00048 
00050    virtual ~CParameter2D();
00051 
00055         inline CPoint2D<float> NormalLineIntersection(const CParameter2D<T>& line) const;
00056 };
00057 
00058 
00060 // Construction/Destruction
00062

00064 template<class T> inline CParameter2D<T>::CParameter2D() : CPoint2D<T>()
00065 {
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 template<class T> inline CParameter2D<T>::CParameter2D(const T x, const T y) : CPoint2D<T>(x, y)
00070 {
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 template<class T> inline CParameter2D<T>::~CParameter2D()
00075 {
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00080 // Public methods
00082 
00083 
00084 template<class T> 
00085 inline CPoint2D<float> CParameter2D<T>::NormalLineIntersection(const CParameter2D<T>& line) const
00086 {
00087         float x, y, denum;
00088         CPoint2D<float> point;
00089         T t1, t2, r1, r2;
00090         t1 = this->GetX();
00091         r1 = this->GetY();
00092         t2 = line.GetX();
00093         r2 = line.GetY();
00094         
00095         // cout << "params: " << *this << " " << line << endl;
00096         // Parallel case   
00097         // cout << endl << "t1 og t2 og abs: " << t1 << " " << t2 << " " << fabs(t1-t2) << endl;
00098         
00099         if (fabs(t1-t2) <= 1.0e-06) 
00100         {
00101                 point.Set(0.0f, 0.0f);
00102         } 
00103         else 
00104         {
00105                 denum = -cos(t2)*sin(t1)+cos(t1)*sin(t2);
00106                 x = -(r2*sin(t1)-r1*sin(t2))/denum;
00107                 y = -(r1*cos(t2)-r2*cos(t1))/denum;
00108                 point.Set(x,y);
00109         }
00110         return point;
00111 }
00112 
00113 
00114 #endif // _IPL98_PARAMETER2D_H
